title: How to Make Quinoa and Vegetable Salad

steps.headline: Cook the quinoa for 10 minutes in twice its volume of water.
Cut the carrots and capsicums into thin sticks (julienne).
Throw the vegetable sticks into the boiling water.
Allow the quinoa to cool down.
Pour the vinaigrette mixture into the cooled down quinoa.
Mix delicately and sprinkle it with chopped chives.
steps.description: Serve with the fresh cobs of corn.

text: Cook the quinoa for 10 minutes in twice its volume of water.  Cut the carrots and capsicums into thin sticks (julienne).  Throw the vegetable sticks into the boiling water.  Grate the onion finely. Put it into the vinaigrette. Allow the quinoa to cool down.  Pour the vinaigrette mixture into the cooled down quinoa.  Mix delicately and sprinkle it with chopped chives. Serve with the fresh cobs of corn.
